attributes.action: change the way a successer t o an out going prime minster is preformed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
any time a prime minster resigns half way through a term, then a general election must be held.
some ppl vote not for the party but for the leader 
the general public should have a voice in who is the next prime minster
or do all the party`s think what the public think doesnt matter ? why should any party automatically decide who should be a prime minster? leader of the party is down to the party but prime minister should be decided by no one but the british public

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
